title: Updated Clubs List
content:
Hi guys, I'm looking to join some space or aerodynamics club, but they've all closed registrations in silence or are based in the EC campus  


So, I have two qns:   
1) Can I apply for a EC club from RR? And will there be any major problems with it, if yes?  
2) Is there a way to be up to date on the active clubs on both campuses, because the PESU clubs website isn't up to date

comments.body: aeolus might restart again in jan. there r aerodynamic positions within haya and vega tho. space club, there is equinox but their one and one only project is the rover project. some of us are trying to start a rocketry club tho, and ik another grp of people that is interested in making another aero/aviation club

As a former member of Aeolus (Aerospace club of PESU), yeah, we have almost closed down because of some department issues (sad long story)
Answering the other 2 issues

1) No RR peeps cannot join EC campus clubs
2) There's a pinned post with all clubs' Instagram page and there's a PESU Discord Server. These are the best 2 places to stay up to date with all club stuff

[club orientation ](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1A6Qb8h2j_trr1xz0xlYjnCTx--1EnWDz/view?usp=drivesdk)

We had club orientation at ec campus after we joined. Here's a link to that
